name: Worlds Apart (shanemsilver)
description:
Stranded on a distant island, you must save your friend and find a way home. 

Keyboard/Mouse Controls

WASD - Movement

E - Interact / Pick Up / Use Item 

Right Mouse - Aim 

Left Mouse - Shoot 

R - Reload

P - Pause Game 

Xbox One Gamepad Controls

Left Thumbstick - Movement

Right Thumbstick - Rotate Camera 

X Button - Interact / Pick Up / Use Item

Left Trigger - Aim 

Right Trigger - Shoot 

B - Reload
